page.title: 06FIGHELDEAN SCHOOL FAYRE
page.content: On the{11th of May 1985 at 2.30pm, {the school May-Fayre}took place.The {May Queen & her two assistants,Tracy {White & Susan & Linda Greengrass.}The May Queen & her assistants went around the village on a horse-box trailer, announcing the Fayre to the people of the village. After opening the Fayre the May Queen introduced the{Maypole dancing}by the school team.The stalls included:-toys & books,handicrafts,cakes,sweets & ices,bottle & white elephant.There were many sideshows such as treasure hunt,skittles,darts,roll-a-penny,net- ball goals & airflow balls in a bucket.A traditional raffle was held with many prizes.One of the classrooms was converted into a tea-room which went down very well with the grown-ups as it was very cold. { The total amount raised was Â£206.
